shellHook:
# Create/update symlink to AGENTS rules directory
ln -sfn /nix/store/wsqzf0z3hg8mhpq484f24fm72qp4k6sg-AGENTS/rules .opencode-rules

# Generate opencode.json configuration file
cat > opencode.json <<'OPENCODE_EOF'
{"$schema":"https://opencode.ai/config.json","instructions":[".opencode-rules/concerns/coding-style.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/naming.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/documentation.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/testing.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/git-workflow.md",".opencode-rules/concerns/project-structure.md"]}
OPENCODE_EOF
